name: Tidder
description:
You are Tidder! Your species is from the land of Reddit. Your job is to capture all the Internet Trolls using your Reddit antenna to spit bubbles at the Trolls. There is a coin in every level.... You don't have to get the coin but you will instantly become cooler if you do.

Oddly there is a rocket ship on every level and if it leaves before you capture the trolls then the remaining trolls will double their speed.

You will get an extra 10 seconds (it will countdown ;) to get the coin once you capture all the trolls.

** (THERE IS CONTROLLER SUPPORT)****

Controls: Move with the arrows Jump with up arrow Fly by holding up arrow Spit bubbles using your Reddit antenna by pressing SPACE
